sen.j: 洋食（ようしょく）とは、日本国内で供される西洋風の料理を指す用語である。

Fried oysters is a creative cuisine developed in Japan and is not a general method of cooking in Western countries where people usually eat raw oysters.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: エビフライ- 洋食の定番メニューであるが、これも欧米では一般的な調理方法ではない。
sen.e: Fried prawns is a common menu of Yoshoku, which is not a common cooking method in the Western countries as well.
Fried prawns are a common dish found in Yoshoku, which is not a common method of cooking used in Western countries as well.
Fried prawns are a standard item found in Yoshoku, which is not a general method of cooking used in Western countries, either.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 現在では最も一般的なエビの調理方法であり、またエビフライの普及により日本が世界的なエビの輸入国となったことも見逃せない。
sen.e: It is the most common cooking method at present, and it should be noted that Japan became the largest importing country of prawn in the world caused by the spread of prawns.
Frying is the most common cooking method at present, and it should be noted that Japan became the largest importer of prawns in the world due to the spread of fried prawns.
Frying is the most prevailing cooking method of prawns at present, and it should be noted that Japan became the largest importer of prawns in the world due to the spread of the fried prawns.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: ムニエル
sen.e: Meuniere
Meuniere
Meuniere

sen.j: ハヤシライス - ハッシュドビーフまたはビーフストロガノフとご飯との組合せが更に変化したもの。
sen.e: Hashed rice originates from the combination of hashed beef or beef stroganoff with rice.
Hashed rice originates from a combination of hashed beef or beef stroganoff with rice.
Hashed rice originates from a combination of hashed beef or beef stroganoff with rice.

sen.j: スパゲッティ - ナポリタンなどの日本独自のものや、タラコ･納豆などの特定調理法のスパゲッティがよく食べられている。
sen.e: Such unique spaghetti in Japan as spaghetti Neapolitan and other specific spaghetti including salted cod roe and Natto (fermented soybeans) are popular.
Unique spaghetti in Japan such as spaghetti Neapolitan and other spaghetti dishes which include salted cod roe and Natto (fermented soybeans) are popular.
Unique spaghetti in Japan such as spaghetti Neapolitan and other spaghetti dishes which include salted cod roe or fermented soybeans are popular.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 牛カツ（ビフカツ）- 東日本では一般的ではないが、近畿地方ではよく食べられている。
sen.e: Beef cutlet is not common in the East Japan, but popular in the Kinki region.
Beef cutlet is not common in East Japan, but popular in the Kinki region.
Beef cutlet is not generally eaten in East Japan, but popular in the Kinki region.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: ステーキ- 洋食の典型的なメニューだが、専門のステーキ店ではしばしば和風のソースや箸を用いるなど和食的な要素もある。
sen.e: Steak is a common menu of Yoshoku, but it is often served as a Japanese food with soy source and chopsticks in some steak restaurants.
Steak is a common menu in Yoshoku, and is often served as Japanese food with soy sauce and chopsticks in some steak restaurants.
Steak is a standard item in Yoshoku, and is often served as Japanese food with Japanese style sauce and chopsticks in some steak restaurants.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 比較的安価で供されるものに「サイコロステーキ」があり、ファミリーレストランの定番メニューとなっている。
sen.e: Dice steak' is comparatively a low-class meal and common in family restaurants.
Diced steak' is a comparatively low-class meal and common in family restaurants.
Diced steak' is served at relatively low price and a standard item in family restaurants.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: ハンバーグ- 肉料理の中では比較的安価なひき肉を用いるため、家庭料理として早くから普及した。
sen.e: Hamburger has been spread early as a home cuisine because it uses ground meat which is cheaper than other meats.
Hamburger spread early as a home cuisine because it used ground meat which is cheaper than other meats.
Hamburger spread early as a home cuisine because it uses ground meat which is cheaper than other meats.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。

sen.j: 照り焼き等を用いた和洋折衷の調理方法もある。
sen.e: It is also cooked in half in Japanese style and half in Western style (in a semi-Western style) such as teriyaki.
It is also cooked using a hybrid cooking method that combines both Japanese and Western styles (in a semi-Western style) using teriyaki.
It is also cooked with a hybrid cooking method that combines both Japanese and Western styles using teriyaki and the like.
sen.cmt: FBに基づいて修正しました。
